profiledesc.descrules: Finding aid based on DACS (Describing Archives: A Content Standard).

change.item: This finding aid was updated in alignment with LC EAD 2.0 specifications using a python script created by Erik Radio.

did.head: Collection Summary
did.abstract: Original typescript of an automobile trip through Mexico in 1953, from El Paso to Mexico City and vicinity. Provides personal narratives and observations of landscapes, cities, hotel accommodations, and activities. Contains a few mounted postcards and magazine pictures.

repository.label: Repository
repository.corpname: University of Arizona Libraries, Special Collections

accessrestrict.head: Restrictions
accessrestrict.p: There are no restrictions on this collection.

userestrict.head: Copyright

prefercite.head: Credit Line
prefercite.p: Mexico, May 1953: travel diary (MS 123). Special Collections, University of Arizona Libraries.

bioghist.head: Biographical Note
bioghist.p: Frank and May Mead, tourists, Tucson, Ariz.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Note
scopecontent.p: Original typescript of an automobile trip through Mexico in 1953, from El Paso to Mexico City and vicinity. Provides personal narratives and observations of landscapes, cities, hotel accomodations, and activities. Contains a few mounted postcards and magazine pictures.
